name: Just Dance Now 2018 - Neolish Team
description:
Try the new Just Dance Now Stylish based on the newest Just Dance 2018 from Ubisoft
This new stylish brings
-New Animations
-rebranded menus
-Colored Menus

The Stylish don't feature any Hack for your game, such as Poiting Hack/Unlimited Coins, its 100% Legal


NOTE: There is a few misplaced stuff in it, we will work on it ;)

We hope you like it
Neolish Team
additional_info:
Changelog
- Covers position fixed
- Let Me Love You Added
- Je sais pas danser Added
- Coach Selection Info ''kinda'' fixed
- Cofee buyed for our developers
